name: WizKids Games Companion
description:
Bring a free digital twist to your next game night!

The WizKids Games Companion offers a scoring helper for the Fantasy Realms card game. After your game is complete, you can simplify scoring by inputting your cards into the app and instantly see who won. Its also a handy lookup of all cards in the Fantasy Realms game.

The app is available for free... just in time for your next gaming session!
